languages.text: "Напрасная надежда. И опасная к тому же — в стремлении вверх марались и иные, более благодетельные слуги Его".
"Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."
languages.original_text: "Напрасная надежда. И опасная к тому же — в стремлении вверх марались и иные, более благодетельные слуги Его".

traits.locale_text: "Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."
"Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."
"Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."
"Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."
"Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."

languages.text: “你的希望不仅是虚假的，也是危险的。在祂的仆人之中，曾有比你更加正直的人，这些人在试图超越其他人的时候落入了腐化的陷阱。”
languages.original_text: "Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."

traits.locale_text: “你的希望不仅是虚假的，也是危险的。在祂的仆人之中，曾有比你更加正直的人，这些人在试图超越其他人的时候落入了腐化的陷阱。”

languages.text: «Sus esperanzas, además de infundadas, son peligrosas: entre Sus sirvientes ha habido gente con más integridad que ha acabado mancillada en sus intentos por destacar por encima del resto».
languages.original_text: "Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."

traits.locale_text: «Sus esperanzas, además de infundadas, son peligrosas: entre Sus sirvientes ha habido gente con más integridad que ha acabado mancillada en sus intentos por destacar por encima del resto».

languages.text: 「そのような希望を抱くのは間違っている上に危険です。皇帝の従者の中には、他者より上に立とうとして自らを堕落させた、より高潔な人々がいました」
languages.original_text: "Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."

traits.locale_text: 「そのような希望を抱くのは間違っている上に危険です。皇帝の従者の中には、他者より上に立とうとして自らを堕落させた、より高潔な人々がいました」

languages.text: "Eure Hoffnung ist nicht nur falsch, sondern auch gefährlich – unter Seinen Dienern gab es schon Rechtschaffenere, die sich bei dem Versuch befleckt haben, sich über die anderen zu erheben."
languages.original_text: "Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Hoffnung ist nicht nur falsch, sondern auch gefährlich – unter Seinen Dienern gab es schon Rechtschaffenere, die sich bei dem Versuch befleckt haben, sich über die anderen zu erheben."

languages.text: « Non seulement votre espoir est faux, mais il est aussi dangereux. Parmi Ses serviteurs, des personnes de plus grande intégrité se sont déjà avilies en tentant de transcender leur condition. »
languages.original_text: "Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."

traits.locale_text: « Non seulement votre espoir est faux, mais il est aussi dangereux. Parmi Ses serviteurs, des personnes de plus grande intégrité se sont déjà avilies en tentant de transcender leur condition. »

languages.text: "Umudun yalnızca boş değil, tehlikeli de. İmparator'un hizmetkârları arasındaki dürüstlük timsali kişilerin, diğerlerinin üzerine çıkmaya çabalarken kendilerini lekeledikleri çoktur."
languages.original_text: "Not only is your hope false, it is also dangerous — among His servants, there have been people of greater integrity who sullied themselves in their attempts to rise above the rest."

traits.locale_text: "Tek sahip olduğun umut yalnızca boş değil, tehlikeli de aynı zamanda. O'nun hizmetkârları arasındaki doğruluğuyla tanınan insanların, diğerlerinin üzerine çıkmaya çabalarken kendilerini lekeledikleri nadir değildir."
